소속
한양대학교 서울캠퍼스 의과대학 의학과 / 산부인과 교실
학력
1995~2001 : 한양대학교 의학사
2002~2004 : 한양대학교 의학석사 (전공 : 산부인과학,부인종양학)
2009~2013 : 한양대학교 의학박사 (전공 : 산부인과학,부인종양학)
연구실적
1. Ko JH, Choi JS, Bae J, Lee WM, Koh AR, Boo
H, Lee E, Hong JH.Safety of laparoscopically assisted vaginal hysterectomy for
women with anterior wall adherence after cesarean section. Obstet Gynecol Sci.
2015 Nov;58(6):501-6. doi: 10.5468/ogs.2015.58.6.501. Epub 2015 Nov 16.
2.  Lee
WM,  Kim SN,  Park KS, Kim JB, Han DJ, Bae
J. The effect of Lactobacillus casei extract on cervical cancer cell lines.

Aug 13.
3. Bae J, Choi JS, Lee WM, Koh AR, Jung US,
Ko JH, Lee JH. Feasibility and efficacy of laparoscopic restaging surgery for
women with unexpected ovarian malignancy. Eur J Obstet Gynecol Reprod Biol. 2015

4.  Lee
WM,  Kim SW,  Kim JT, Kim YH. Vulvar and
vaginal reconstruction using the "angel wing" perforator-based island flap.

2015 Mar 30.

Ko JH, Koh AR, Park SH. Laparoscopically assisted vaginal hysterectomy for women

pii: e2014.00315. doi: 10.4293/JSLS.2014.00315.
6. Hoh JK, Lee WM, Lee HJ, Hwang
JH.Misdiagnosis of a large uterine vein thrombosis as a uterine myoma prior to

Feb;42(2):88-90.

Lim I, Kim K. Characteristics of thyroid incidentalomas detected by

9.

Lee ED, Ryu SY. Clinicopathologic factors for central recurrence in patients

9. Jang KS, Lee WM, Kim YJ, Cho SH. Collision

10. Ryu SY, Lee WM, Kim K, Park SI, Kim BJ,
Kim MH, Choi SC, Cho CK, Nam BH, Lee ED. Randomized clinical trial of weekly vs.

11.

J. Clinicopathological characteristics of ovarian tumors according to menarchal

언론활동
▪ 17.9.20일자 <조선일보> "일회용 생리대, 2~3시간마다 바꿔야"에서 생리혈 양과 관련없이 2,3시간마다 교체해야하는 필요성에 대해 언급
